original_text: The Gentiles do not have God's Law. But they may still do the right things that the Law teaches. They do right things because of what they themselves think is right. In that way they are showing that they have a certain law in their minds, even though they do not know God's Law.
korean_text: (율법 없는 이방인이 본성으로 율법의 일을 행할 때에는 이 사람은 율법이 없어도 자기가 자기에게 율법이 되나니

sentences.original_text: The Gentiles do not have God's Law.
sentences.korean_translation: 이방인들은 하나님의 율법을 가지고 있지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they may still do the right things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 여전히 올바른 일을 할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: They do right things because of what they themselves think is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신이 옳다고 생각하는 것 때문에 옳은 일을 합니다.

sentences.original_text: In that way they are showing
that they have a certain law in their minds,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 마음속에 어떤 율법을 가지고 있다는 것을,

sentences.original_text: even though they do not know God's Law.
